          <title>
            <string language="en">Glass tube cracking</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glasgefäßknacken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fendre de verre de tube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rachar de vidro do tubo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spezzarsi di vetro del tubo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ράγισμα σωλήνων γυαλιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El quebrarse de cristal del tubo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that a hot test-tube may crack if it is suddenly put in cold water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crack</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test-tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal shock</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ein heißes 
Test-Gefäß knacken kann, wenn es plötzlich in kaltes Wasser 
eingesetzt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'un essai-tube chaud 
peut fendre s'il est soudainement mis en eau froide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que um teste-tubo quente
pode rachar se for posto de repente na água fria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che un prova-tubo 
caldo può spezzarsi se è messo improvvisamente in acqua fredda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ένας καυτός 
δοκιμή-σωλήνας μπορεί να ραγίσει εάν τίθεται ξαφνικά στο κρύο 
νερό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que un prueba-tubo 
caliente puede quebrarse si se pone repentinamente en agua fría.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
